item.description:
Update: I called to make reservations and looks like Max DT is quite in demand. I could get a table for 8 at 7:30pm. 1/2 are wino spots, 1/2 are CT wing spots. Looking forward to it. The menu looks fabu.

It's Taste of Hartford. I made a reservation for 7:30pm for Max Downtown. This place is pretty swanky and it's not often you can go in there and eat for $23 (plus tax and tip). Please read the menu below and notice one entree choice has extra charge. Bon appetit!

1 st course

Rosedale farms sweet corn bisque, chive oil
Tuscan salad‐ cherry tomatoes, kalamata olives, roasted garlic, fresh mozz, polenta croutons
Baby greens salad‐ cucumber, radish, ricotta salata, lemon herb vinaigrette

Entrees

Block island swordfish‐panzanella salad, basil puree
Grilled pork chop‐ cornbread sausage stuffing, haricots verts, crispy onions, whole grain mustard jus
Herb roasted Murray's chicken breast‐ Basil potato puree, Rosedale farms garden ratatouille
Grilled New York strip steak, panko crusted vine‐ripe tomatoes, watercress, frilled red onions, gorgonzola sauce (+ $8 additional charge)

Dessert

Fresh berry shortcake parfait
Chocolate bombe cake
Vanilla crème brulee

http://www.tastehartford.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Organizer will email Yes RSVP with cell phone # closer to event
item.name: Taste of Hartford @ Max Downtown 7:30pm
